info.author: hoatle
info.description:
django-vouch
============

extension to django.contrib.auth as an identity manager with wide range of auth mechanism support.

Continuous Integration
----------------------

.. image:: https://ci.teracy.org/buildStatus/icon?job=django-vouch-develop
  :alt: Teracy CI
  :target: https://ci.teracy.org/job/django-vouch-develop/


Usage
-----



Installation
------------

Add ``vouch`` application into your requirements file:
::
    django-vouch

Or with ``pip``:
::
    $ pip install django-vouch

Or with ``setuptools``:

Download the source code at https://code.teracy.org/projects/DJ/repos/vouch and:
::
    $ python setup.py install

To download the latest snapshot development version with ``pip``:
::
    pip install -i http://pypi.teracy.org/teracy/public/+simple/ django-vouch --pre


Configuration
-------------



Contributing
------------

1. File issues at https://issues.teracy.org/browse/VOUCH

2. Follow workflow at http://dev.teracy.org/docs/workflow.html

3. Notices:

Make sure to resolve the dependency requirements:
::
    $ make resolve

Make sure to check the coding style:
::
    $ make check-style

Make sure to run tests:
::
    $ make test

Make sure to check the coverage report:
::
    $ make report-coverage


Authors and contributors
------------------------

- Hoat Le: http://github.com/hoatle


License
-------

    All rights reserved.

           this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.

           notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the

        3. Neither the name of Teracy, Inc. nor the names of its contributors may be used

           specific prior written permission.
